attachments.pretext: You can use following messages for vmcjp app.

fields.title: Register VMC's API token
fields.value: Type `register token` to register this org's API token. This token will stored in this system db. You need to register your token at first if you want to use this slack app.

fields.title: Delete VMC's API token
fields.value: Type `delete token` to delete your token stored in this system db.

fields.title: Create SDDC
fields.value: Type `create sddc` to create sddc on this org.  You can create single or multi host sddc.  You can check results in #vmcjpdemo channel.

fields.title: Create SDDC on ZEROCLOUD
fields.value: Type `create sddc on zerocloud` to create sddc on zerocloud.  This will deploy virtual SDDC and this type of sddc will not consume AWS's bare metal.  You can check results in #vmcjpdemo channel.

fields.title: Delete SDDC
fields.value: Type `delete sddc` to delete sddc from this org.  You can delete only the sddc which you created.  You can check results in #vmcjpdemo channel.

fields.title: List SDDCs
fields.value: Type `list sddcs` to list sddc which deployed on VMC JP SET org.
